item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 31, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. I keep turning my Google Sheets into phone-friendly webapps, and I can't stop (153 points | 52 comments)
2. Coconut by Meta AI – Better LLM Reasoning with Chain of Continuous Thought? (57 points | 9 comments)
3. Dumping Memory to Bypass BitLocker on Windows 11 (207 points | 132 comments)
4. "A Course of Pure Mathematics" – G. H. Hardy (1921) [pdf] (147 points | 29 comments)
5. I Wrote a Game Boy Advance Game in Zig (91 points | 31 comments)
6. Cook: Colliding with the SHA prefix of Linux's initial Git commit (44 points | 14 comments)
7. Reverse Engineering the Duco Connectivity Board (9 points | 1 comment)
8. Lightstorm: Minimalistic Ruby Compiler (46 points | 6 comments)
9. Orbit. Mozilla's AI Assistant for Firefox (114 points | 125 comments)
10. More telcos confirm Salt Typhoon breaches as White House weighs in (63 points | 32 comments)
11. Learning Solver Design: Automating Factorio Balancers (158 points | 22 comments)
12. Beyond Gradient Averaging in Parallel Optimization (59 points | 16 comments)
13. Jack Elam and the Fly in 'Once Upon a Time in the West' (67 points | 11 comments)
14. LineageOS 22 Released (89 points | 26 comments)
15. I made a tiny library for switches and sum types in Lua (26 points | 2 comments)
16. Curl-Impersonate (375 points | 94 comments)
17. Tell HN: John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem, has died (840 points | 74 comments)
18. 'Obelisks': New class of life has been found in human digestive system (354 points | 115 comments)
19. Experimenting with architectures for video games inspired by tabletop games (3 points | discuss)
20. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (174 points | 83 comments)
21. Execution units are often pipelined (148 points | 76 comments)
22. The Homa Network Protocol (68 points | 12 comments)
23. RubyConf 2024: Cloud Native Buildpack Hackday (and other Ruby deploy tools, too) (55 points | 6 comments)
24. How Well Do LLMs Generate Code for Different Application Domains? (55 points | 19 comments)
25. Ts_zip: Text Compression Using Large Language Models (121 points | 48 comments)
26. Performance of LLMs on Advent of Code 2024 (56 points | 29 comments)
27. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (170 points | 54 comments)
28. Behind the Scenes: Alien Worlds – Jumpship over a tidally locked planet (27 points | 1 comment)
29. China to Build Thorium Molten-Salt Reactor in 2025 (101 points | 51 comments)
30. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (94 points | 10 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 31, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
